price: 41 Les impies, reconnaissables à leurs traits particuliers, seront saisis par le toupet et les pieds[1372].
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yuʿ'rafu al-muj'rimūna bisīmāhum fayu'khadhu bil-nawāṣī wal-aqdāmi
